title: Mafia Jinx W does NOT show animation after the line
body:
I don't have a screen shot but I Was just in a ranked game and her W would not show the animation (You would see the purple line up but the actual bullet would not fly and would instantly hit right as the purple disappeared) 

It happened with the Mafia Jinx skin

replies.body:
i am not really like her skin Mafia,but now she has a new skin,its coming soon.
regular skin is better than Mafia that what i think

Hi there! 

Thanks so much for the report! We'll load Mafix Jinx up and see what's going on with her Zap! animation.
